staxel.village.character.dialogue.Vorlen: My wife would have loved this island...
She was never one to share my interests.
It is wonderful to be reunited with ^c:1486b0;{0-daughter}^c:pop;...
But I hope I do not end up as a butterfly once more...
How her wings shone with magnificent colour...
That other world presented a vast collection of art.
I'd love to visit that place once more...
But I'm not sure anymore how to get there.
